Module com.example.c195pa
Package com.example.c195pa.dao

Class appointmentAccess

java.lang.Object
com.example.c195pa.dao.appointmentAccess
public class appointmentAccess extends Object
Class for accessing the appointments table and performing CRUD on appointments objects

      context - context text of the alert

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments() throws SQLException
      getAllAppointments gets everything from the appointments table, as well as the contact name from the contacts table to create an appointment object. The object is then added to the appointmentsObservableList
      Returns:
      appointments observable list
      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurs during the query

    • addAppointment

      public static boolean addAppointment(Appointments a) throws SQLException
      Attempts to add the user created appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      a - the appointment the user is attempting to add, passed the addAppointment controller.
      Returns:
      boolean based on if adding the appointment worked or not
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the query

    • updateAppointment

      public static boolean updateAppointment(Appointments a) throws SQLException
      Attempts to update the appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      a - the appointment the user is attempting to update, passed the modifyAppointment controller.
      Returns:
      boolean based on if updating the appointment worked or not
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the query

    • deleteAppointment

      public static boolean deleteAppointment(int appointmentID) throws SQLException
      Attempt to delete the appointment the user has selected in the appointment table view on the main screen.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - passed to set the appointment ID in the query
      Returns:
      boolean whether or not deleting the appointment worked.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the attempted deletion

    • getAppointmentsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsByContact(String contactName) throws SQLException
      Function called that returns an observable list based on what contact the user has selected on the reports page.
      Parameters:
      contactName - passed from the combo box on the report page where the user can select a contact to view just their appointments
      Returns:
      observable list to be displayed on the reports page
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the query

    • populateAppointmentsByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> populateAppointmentsByMonth() throws SQLException
      Function called that returns an observable list based on the month and type of the appointment on the reports page.
      Returns:
      observable list to be displayed on the reports page
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the query

    • viewByWeek

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> viewByWeek() throws SQLException
      Function to query the database to return an observable list of appointment objects that are within the users current week.
      Returns:
      observable list of appointment objects that are within the users current week
      Throws:

      public static boolean validateAppointments(Appointments a) throws SQLException

      Parameters:

      Returns:
